head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DANA, NANCY (ANN) T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DANA, NANCY (ANN) T.

block.p: DANA-Nancy (Ann) T. Died peacefully at home on July 4, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Lucien, kind and loving aunt of Marta Raab and Constance Morgan. Former Administrative Assistant in the Department of Medicine, Cornell University Medical College. Funeral services will be held at St. Catherine of Siena Church, 411 East 68th St., NYC, July 11, at 10 AM. For further information please contact John Krtil Funeral Home; Yorkville Funeral Service Inc., 212-744-3084.
